review: This was my wife's birthday gift from our tech-savy son. When asked to install it, I waited several weeks before opening the box. I learned that we needed a special cable (not included). Taking full advantage of my Prime membership, I ordered the cable -- not expensive and it arrived in two days.With cable in hand, I approached installation with some fear. To my surprise installation was quick, easy and only required me to go to my computer to get my Amazon password. This may have been the most effortless installation I have ever experienced.Use has been easy. The voice recognition feature has allowed us to find shows without lots of scrolling and frustration.This is a six star product.
